Thanks [~ljain] for working on this and post the patch. It looks good to me overall. Just have one question:

 

Line 1322-1342 seems a dupplicate of Line 1302-1321, can we just keep one of them to avoid confusion?
[~xyao] Thanks for reviewing the patch! v2 patch addresses your comments.

Thanks [~ljain] for the update. Two more comments:

 

The patch has a small typo

Line 1286: Direcory => Directory

 

Also please add the description on why the {{user.name=<USER>?}} is required?
[~xyao] Thanks for reviewing the patch! v3 patch addresses your comments.
